strIntroduction: Business Class hospitality, taking you directly to the hotel from the airport or from the hotel to the airport,no need to take a suitcase in crowded city bus.
strLocation: Hong Kong and Macau, Hong Kong
strTitle: Hong Kong airport and hotel shuttle bus

strIntroduction: Recommended by Mayday, Lin Dan, and so many other famous celebrities! 「Bridge Spicy Crab」is one of the most popular food in HK. Already founded for 20 years, it has attracted a large number of admiring diners every year!
strLocation: Hong Kong and Macau, Hong Kong
strTitle: 【Highly recommended by Chinese celebrities】HK Wanchai Authentic Under Bridge Spicy Crab Set (for 2 or 4 people)

strIntroduction: Zen Noodle Cafe is a Japanese food restaurant located at Ngong Ping Village near the Po Lin Monastery. It provides a range of Japanese Noodles and hearty refreshments. As customers enjoy these delicacies, they will be surrounded by a peaceful, oriental-style architecture in blissful surroundings.
strLocation: Hong Kong and Macau, Hong Kong
strTitle: Ngong Ping Village “Zen Noodle Cafe” E-voucher (100 HKD)

strIntroduction: 享受「好心情」音樂、寧神花茶和日光小陽台，還可以製作自己的回憶月曆或小玻璃禮物瓶。
strLocation: Hong Kong and Macau, Hong Kong
strTitle: 【Scented tea & Music】A Handwork Shop in the flourishing city

strIntroduction: 來自德國的魔彩麵糰，只要加水後就可以整成由天然蔬菜色素製成四色麵糰。不僅好吃更是開心又放心。讓您輕鬆與子女感受創意小廚師的樂趣，啟發小朋友無限創意，創作出獨一無二的餅乾！
strLocation: Hong Kong and Macau, Hong Kong
strTitle: Use Colorful Dough to Bake Cookies！

strIntroduction: Just make 1 payment for 3 travel services in Hong Kong: (1)private airport pickup (2)private city tour (3)private departure transfer
strLocation: Hong Kong and Macau, Hong Kong
strTitle: Hong Kong private tour & airport transfers package

strIntroduction: 喜歡唱歌，但每次去KTV你想獨唱別人又偏偏「插」把聲進來；又或是個個都在玩HIGH了，沒有人聽你SOLO。現在有專業錄音師及價值近百萬投資的錄音設備錄製你「專屬」的個人大碟！
strLocation: Hong Kong and Macau, Hong Kong
strTitle: 【Wanna be a star?】Record Your Own Video!

strIntroduction: 提到皮革品牌，大家自然會聯想到那數個國際名牌子，設計精美，手工一流。雖然出自名師打造，但如果是由自己親手整造皮具，一定更能反映個人性格及切合個人需要。想像一下，你每日帶在身上用的都是自己親自一針一線做成的皮革品，感覺一定很棒！
strLocation: Hong Kong and Macau, Hong Kong
strTitle: Leather Card Holder Workshop

strIntroduction: Lights night, so you can enjoy food, boarded Dragon Pearl, enjoy the Symphony of the harbor!
strLocation: Hong Kong and Macau, Hong Kong
strTitle: Dragon Pearl: night tours of the harbor, taste of Western-style meal
